sql-case.value: CREATE USER user1 DEFAULT ROLE role1
CREATE USER user1, user2 DEFAULT ROLE role1
CREATE USER IF NOT EXISTS user1 DEFAULT ROLE role1
CREATE USER user1 DEFAULT ROLE role1, role2
CREATE USER user1 IDENTIFIED BY 'password' DEFAULT ROLE role1
CREATE USER user1 DEFAULT ROLE role1 MAX_QUERIES_PER_HOUR 1
CREATE USER user1 DEFAULT ROLE role1 MAX_QUERIES_PER_HOUR 1 MAX_UPDATES_PER_HOUR 1
CREATE USER user1 DEFAULT ROLE role1 PASSWORD EXPIRE DEFAULT
CREATE USER user1 DEFAULT ROLE role1 PASSWORD EXPIRE DEFAULT PASSWORD HISTORY DEFAULT
CREATE USER user1 DEFAULT ROLE role1 ACCOUNT LOCK
CREATE USER user1 DEFAULT ROLE role1 MAX_QUERIES_PER_HOUR 1 MAX_UPDATES_PER_HOUR 1 PASSWORD EXPIRE DEFAULT PASSWORD HISTORY DEFAULT ACCOUNT LOCK
